metadata.synopsis: One liner defeault dialog for the pair of kids who have lost their ball in the waterfall at the Park.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to either of the kids arguing about having lost their ball at the back of the Park in the Lower City.

0.speaker: Emen
0.text: Stupid Conall, throwing my ba - Sorry. Mam said I shouldn't talk to strangers.

1.speaker: Emen
1.text: Stupid Conall. Ruining my ball. Turdbrain.
